PHRASE.LANG: What better way to hide from those behind the conspiracy than in plain sight? Be the life of the party, dance around, make them think you are a fool. But all the while you’ll be watching them and shining the light on what they are trying to hide.[#Legal]

Ce qui est un meilleur endroit pour se cacher de ceux qui sont derrière le complot que dans la vue de tous? Soyez la vie du parti, danser, faire croire que vous êtes un imbécile. Mais pendant tout ce temps vous allez les regarder et de la lumière sur ce qu'ils essaient de cacher.[#Legal]

What better way to hide from those behind the conspiracy than in plain sight? Be the life of the party, dance around, make them think you are a fool. But all the while you’ll be watching them and shining the light on what they are trying to hide.[#Legal]
